title: Disable 3D / Terrain Elevation / Relief of the UWP MapControl
body: I want to disable 3D or set every mountain/surface in the map to altitude zero? I need to have a fully flat map. I know I can disable the user from changing the camera's pitch, but it is not enough.

comments.body:
No, there is no way to do this. The world is not flat, and the map accurately reflects the shape of the world.
You can set the map control mode to "None" which will be a blank canvas that you can add a raster tile layer to and will not have any terrain.
